80010010 7C0803A6
3821000C 4E800020

Changes the camera FOV at will.

Support Status:
 + Battle (Offline)
 + Battle (Online)
 + Grand Prix
 - Menu
 + VS Race (Offline)
 + VS Race (Online)
 + Time Trials
 - Wii Remote
 - Wii Remote + Nunchuck
 - Wii U Classic Controller
 + Wii U GamePad

How to use:
When activating, the camera will switch FOV modes.

Activator(s):

[Wii U GamePad]
Toggle: Right Stick Press

Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
